title: ODE gearbox test times out in debug mode

content.raw:
The test [passes in 115 seconds](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/42/testReport/(root)/ODEGearboxJoint_TEST/) in release mode, but [consistently fails via timeout in debug mode](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci_BTDebug-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/13/testReport/(root)/INTEGRATION_joint_gearbox/test_ran/). The timeout is 240 seconds.

This is not surprising, since the `JointTestRevolute.SimplePendulum/0` test takes [48 seconds in release mode](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-ci-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/42/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_JointTestRevolute/SimplePendulum_0/) and [117 seconds in debug mode](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci_BTDebug-default-trusty-amd64-gpu-none/13/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_JointTestRevolute/SimplePendulum_0/).

We should expand the timeout for the gearbox test.
content.html:
The test passes in 115 seconds in release mode, but consistently fails via timeout in debug mode. The timeout is 240 seconds.

This is not surprising, since the JointTestRevolute.SimplePendulum/0 test takes 48 seconds in release mode and 117 seconds in debug mode.

We should expand the timeout for the gearbox test.
